summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4302 for the improvement of Ashworth Avenue, from North 82nd Street to North 85th Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51074, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
